item.title: Gunmen kill at least 27 at memorial for Afghan Shiite leader
item.description: KABUL, Afghanistan (AP) — Gunmen killed at least 27 people and wounded at least 55 others in Afghanistan’s capital on Friday at a remembrance ceremony for a minority Shiite leader, officials said.
